mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MeasureData(mid, sid, pid, patientUserId, parame, valueUnit, value, startTime, endTime) VALUES(MeasureData_seq.nextval,#{sid},#{pid},#{patientUserId},#{parame},#{valueUnit},#{value},TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{startTime}, '000'), 'YY.MM.DD-HH24:MI:SS.FF6'), TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{endTime}, '000'), 'YY.MM.DD-HH24:MI:SS.FF6'))
mapper.select: select * from MeasureData order by mid desc
